ul.li: Download &appName; v2.1.1 [18 kB ZIP archive of MATLAB codes] [This version includes Fisher's method, the Mudholkar-George method, and the Liptak-Stouffer method, as described in the above article. In addition, v2.1.1 fixes some minor issues with the previous version.] [README]
Download &appName; v2.1.0 [17 kB ZIP archive of MATLAB codes] [This version includes Fisher's method, the Mudholkar-George method, and the Liptak-Stouffer method, as described in the above article. ]

Download Java version of &appName;'s nonparametric method [This version implements the nonparametric method and uses the weighted Fisher's method.]
User Manual for Java version (html)
User Manual for Java version (pdf, 244 kB)

isb:document.p: The development of &appName; is supported by grants from the National Science Foundation (NSF) and the National Institutes of Health (NIH).
